Hey Prashant, just a question - is it possible that you stick to 2hour+ long movies (like this one) when you do a HDScene release?

The reason I'm asking is because a 2hour+ movie would probably be on 2CDs anyway and would take 1.4 GB of space, so a HDScene release of about 1.3 GB would be similar in size and people wouldn't have the feeling that it's too big... 

But a shorter movie which you can do in 500MB with your excellent quality and then you do it in HDScene release of 1 GB+... It just feels like too much space if you know what I mean...

But anyway, keep up the excellent work, we all appreciate it!
thanks for the up:)
